item.description:
Special Events
mfafirstfridays
5:30 â€” 9:30 pm
Friday, June 4, 2010
Koch Gallery

Begin each month in a unique and stylish atmosphere at mfafirstfridays. Join us in the Koch Gallery for fine art, live music, and cash bars featuring signature cocktails and delicious tapas.

Relax and unwind in the breathtaking environment with friends both old and new.

Musical lineup for mfafirstfriday:
June 4 - Four Piece Suit

Open to visitors ages 21 and older.

Members: entry is FREE
Nonmembers: entry is FREE with Museum admission (Libraries around Boston may have a pass)

http://www.mfa.org/ca...


we could meet at the enterance to event itself, I'll have the sign "EURO", and will wear a blue/green "Peacock" scarf.
Maia 781-718-6203
item.how_to_find_us: at the enterance to the event. 781-718-6203
